projects.title: CRM - Integrated Phones
projects.description: Advanced CRM feature integrating phone systems, enabling seamless communication tracking, call logging, and customer interaction management directly within the CRM interface.

projects.title: HVAC Maintenance Plans V3
projects.description: Comprehensive maintenance plan management system for HVAC businesses, enabling efficient scheduling, tracking, and billing of recurring maintenance services.

projects.title: Cliffwatcher
projects.description: Stock symbol watcher bot that notifies users when the price of a stock drops below an algorithmic threshold.

projects.title: First Impression AI
projects.description: AI that analyzes a person's photo and generates a report on the first impression it conveys.

projects.title: Thalassa's Grand Heist
projects.description: Embark on an epic underwater heist in Thalatta's Grand Heist, a thrilling adventure game set in the depths of the ocean. You play as Thalatta, a cunning thief on a mission to steal back the legendary Crown of the Tides from the clutches of the evil goddess Ceto.

projects.title: Tax Orca USA
projects.description: Web app that allows US Business Owners to find deductions and expenses they are missing in their tax return.

projects.title: HVAC Business - Daily AI Recommendations
projects.description: AI that provides action recommendations for HVAC business owners based on their customer base and business metrics.

projects.title: Integrated Lending w/ Wisetack
projects.description: Integrated feature that enables seamless lending options for HVAC homeowners directly within the payment portal.

projects.title: EZ Balance Sheet
projects.description: Quickly visualize your financial summary. See your Cashflow and Net Worth by entering in your Monthly Incomes, Expenses, Assets, and Liabilities.

projects.title: Lite Html 5 Audio Player
projects.description: Simple HTML5 audio player that allows users to play and control audio files.
